SEARCH
Package entities

Class Influencer

java.lang.Object
entities.User
entities.Influencer
public class Influencer extends User
Represents an influencer in the influencer platform.

The Influencer class extends the User class and provides functionalities for managing sponsorships, campaigns, and brand partnerships.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) class 
    Influencer.Advertiser
    Represents an advertiser for a campaign.
    static class 
    Influencer.Campaign
    Represents a campaign created by the influencer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Influencer

      public Influencer(String username, String password)
      Constructs a new Influencer with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the influencer.
      password - The password of the influencer.

    • Influencer

      public Influencer(String username, String password, String niche, double engagementRate, String... regions)
      Constructs a new Influencer with the specified username, password, niche, engagement rate, and regions.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the influencer.
      password - The password of the influencer.
      niche - The niche of the influencer.
      engagementRate - The engagement rate of the influencer.
      regions - The regions where the influencer operates.

  • Method Details

    • addBrand

      public void addBrand(BrandManager bm)
      Adds a brand manager to the influencer's list of associated brands.

      This method checks if there is space in the array before adding the brand manager. If the array is full, the brand manager will not be added.

      Parameters:
      bm - The BrandManager to be added.

    • addBrand

      public void addBrand(BrandManager bm1, BrandManager bm2)
      Adds two brand managers to the influencer's list of associated brands.

      This method calls the addBrand(BrandManager) method for each brand manager provided.

      Parameters:
      bm1 - The first BrandManager to be added.
      bm2 - The second BrandManager to be added.

    • printRegions

      public void printRegions(String... regions)
      Prints the specified regions where the influencer operates.

      If no regions are specified, a message indicating that no regions are specified will be printed.

      Parameters:
      regions - The regions where the influencer operates.

    • updateEngagementRate

      public void updateEngagementRate(Double newRate)
      Updates the engagement rate of the influencer.

      This method sets the engagement rate to the new value and prints a message indicating the updated engagement rate.

      Parameters:
      newRate - The new engagement rate to be set.

    • launchCampaign

      public void launchCampaign(String campaignName, double budget, Platform p) throws PaymentFailedException
      Launches a new campaign for the influencer.

      This method creates a new Influencer.Advertiser object and checks if the influencer has enough sponsorship amount to cover the campaign budget. If successful, the campaign is added to the influencer's list of campaigns. If the budget exceeds the available sponsorship amount, a PaymentFailedException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      campaignName - The name of the campaign to be launched.
      budget - The budget allocated for the campaign.
      p - The Platform associated with the campaign.
      Throws:
      PaymentFailedException - If the budget exceeds the available sponsorship amount.

    • viewCampaigns

      public void viewCampaigns()
      Displays the campaigns launched by the influencer.

      This method prints the name of the influencer and iterates through the list of campaigns, displaying each campaign's details.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the influencer dashboard.

      This method prints a message indicating the influencer's dashboard along with the username.

      Specified by:
      displayMenu in class User

    • showStats

      public void showStats()
      Shows the statistics of the influencer.

      This method prints the niche, engagement rate, and total sponsorship amount of the influencer, followed by the list of campaigns.

    • getEngagementRate

      public double getEngagementRate()
      Returns the engagement rate of the influencer.
      Returns:
      The engagement rate of the influencer.

    • getRegions

      public String[] getRegions()
      Returns the regions where the influencer operates.
      Returns:
      An array of regions associated with the influencer.

    • getSponsorshipAmount

      public double getSponsorshipAmount()
      Returns the total sponsorship amount available for the influencer.
      Returns:
      The total sponsorship amount.

    • receivePayment

      public void receivePayment(double amount)
      Receives a payment and adds it to the influencer's sponsorship amount.

      This method updates the sponsorship amount by adding the specified payment amount.

      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of payment to be received.

    • getCampaigns

      public Influencer.Campaign[] getCampaigns()
      Returns the array of campaigns associated with the influencer.
      Returns:
      An array of Influencer.Campaign objects associated with the influencer.

    • getNiche

      public String getNiche()
      Returns the niche of the influencer.
      Returns:
      The niche of the influencer.
